welcome_message_body: Welcome to Larnaca! Get ready to experience the charm of this coastal city, known for its beautiful beaches, rich history, and lively atmosphere. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Larnaca has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Larnaca Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Larnaca Airport, mainly used for seasonal and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ercan Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: VIP Terminal
terminals.description: The VIP terminal at Ercan Airport provides exclusive services for high-end travelers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the WiFi network for free by providing their email address.
